original_text: So the soldiers let their prisoners go free. They gave the people and the things that they had brought from Judah to the leaders and the other people.
korean_text: 이에 무기를 가진 사람들이 포로와 노략한 물건을 방백들과 온 회중 앞에 둔지라

sentences.original_text: So the soldiers let their prisoners go free
and the things that they had brought from Judah
to the leaders and the other people
